statements: SELECT * FROM websites_content WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM websites_content WHERE website_type = 'news';
SELECT id, title, website_type FROM websites_content ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT content FROM websites_content WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM websites_content WHERE id = 3 OR website_type = 'blog';
SELECT id, title, website_type FROM websites_content WHERE website_type = 'blog' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM websites_content WHERE title LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, title, content FROM websites_content WHERE title LIKE '%engineering%' AND website_type = 'tech' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, title, website_type FROM websites_content WHERE website_type IN ('blog', 'news', 'tech') ORDER BY website_type ASC, id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, content FROM websites_content WHERE id >= 5 AND id <= 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_content;
SELECT title, content FROM website_content WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, published_at FROM website_content ORDER BY published_at DESC;
SELECT category, title FROM mobile_app_content WHERE id IN (2,4,5);
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_content WHERE category = 'Games';
SELECT id, title, published_at, content FROM website_content WHERE published_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, content FROM website_content WHERE id = 10 AND published_at < '2022-05-01';
SELECT id, title, content FROM website_content WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY published_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_content WHERE category = 'News' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT title, description, category FROM mobile_app_content WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND category LIKE '%Health%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM websites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, url FROM websites ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, platform FROM mobile_apps WHERE platform = 'iOS';
SELECT * FROM mobile_apps WHERE version >= 2.0;
SELECT id, title FROM content WHERE type = 'article';
SELECT * FROM websites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, url FROM websites WHERE name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, name, platform FROM mobile_apps ORDER BY name DESC, id;
SELECT * FROM mobile_apps WHERE version > 1.5 AND platform = 'iOS';
SELECT id, title, type FROM content WHERE type = 'article' OR type = 'blog' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_content;
SELECT content_title, content_body FROM website_content WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, content_title, published_date FROM website_content ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM website_content WHERE published_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM website_content WHERE content_title LIKE 'Tech%' AND content_body LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT * FROM website_content WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, published_date FROM website_content WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, username, comment_text FROM website_content JOIN comments ON website_content.content_id = comments.content_id;
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_content WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT comment_id, content FROM comments WHERE user_id = 2 AND post_id = 5;
SELECT name, description FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT post_id, title, content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT comment_id, content, user_id FROM comments WHERE post_id = 10 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
